topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: The 'Gabba Good Luck Charm
ideas.premise: A Melbourne hipster insists on bringing a miniature 'Gabba' (cricket ground) diorama to the game for good luck, despite security's objections.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at Melbourne's quirky culture and cricket superstitions, referencing a famous Brisbane ground.

ideas.title: Yarra River Cricket
ideas.premise: Two blokes are playing cricket with a soggy tennis ball on the banks of the Yarra, completely oblivious to the actual T20 match.
ideas.why_funny: Highlights the Melburnian's casual attitude to world-class sport when a kickabout is just as good.

ideas.title: Swan Street Siren
ideas.premise: A Swan Street pub's beer garden is so loud with commentary, it triggers the MCG siren, causing mass confusion.
ideas.why_funny: Uses the iconic MCG siren in a humorous, unexpected context relating to Melbourne pub culture.

ideas.title: The Footy Finals Hangover
ideas.premise: A Melburnian wakes up still wearing his footy scarf, convinced the cricket scores are just a weird dream after the AFL Grand Final.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable hangover humour combined with Melbourne's obsession with Australian Rules Football.

ideas.title: Commentary on Commentary
ideas.premise: Two old blokes in deck chairs are providing their own (highly critical and incorrect) commentary *on* the TV commentary of the T20 match.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at know-it-all sports fans and their unsolicited opinions.
